widget.name: InputBoxOctober
widget.description: Input box with options for on change MF, on leave MF, and configurable masking

property.caption: Mask
property.description:
Define your mask here.
'a' represents an alphabet character (A-Z, a-z), '9' represents a numeric character (0-9), and '*'' represents both (A-Z, a-z, 0-9).
Any other character will be part of the mask; for example, '(999) 999-9999' will only allow you to enter numbers, and the mask will display the parentheses and hyphen between the third and fourth characters.
In addition, use a question mark to designate optional data - anything after the question mark is optional. For example '(999) 999-9999? x99999' will capture an optional 5-digit telephone extension.

property.caption: Placeholder character
property.description: Underscore is the default mask placeholder character. Define a different placeholder character here (should be just one character long, optional).

property.caption: Custom mask definition
property.description:
Use the custom mask placeholder with the custom mask definition to define a custom mask.
For example, if the custom mask placeholder is 'h' (no quotes) and the custom mask definition is '[A-Fa-f0-9]', you can use '#hhhhhh' as a mask for color hex codes (optional).
Documentation can be found at http://digitalbush.com/projects/masked-input-plugin/ .

property.caption: On leave microflow
property.description: The microflow to execute on leave (optional).
